entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
